metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2158 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Off-by-one error in the pngcrush_measure_idat function in pngcrush.c inpngcrush before 1.7.84 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted PNGfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2158` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pngcrush - 1.7.84-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pngcrush package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.84-1').
